mapper.select: SELECT*FROM USERTABLE WHERE USER_ID=#{id} AND USER_PW=#{pw}
SELECT USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS BIRTHDAY, PHONE, ADDRESS, IMAGE FROM USERTABLE WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERTABLE(USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, NICKNAME,BIRTHDAY, PHONE, ADDRESS, IMAGE,GENDER) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{nickname}, TO_DATE(#{birthDay},'YYYY-MM-DD'),#{phone}, #{address}, NVL(#{image},'UIMAGE.jpg'), #{gender})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERTABLE SET USER_PW= #{userPw}, USER_NAME= #{userName},BIRTHDAY=TO_DATE(#{birthDay},'YYYY-MM-DD'), PHONE=#{phone},ADDRESS=#{address}, IMAGE=NVL(#{image},image) where user_id=#{userId}
